name: misty hills
description:
this is my first test using Unreal Engine, and all the assets used are free this month on the unreal engine store.

its a blue field, meant to capture the atmosphere of dusk, when dew starts forming on blades of grass. it is completely unfinished and not polished at all- just a test. :)

it's a pretty big file, and may not run on lower-end PCs. 

www.jaymulholland.co.uk
